document.title: Commission's Resolution on the Inclusion of Sexual Orientation and Gender Identity in University Non-Discrimination Policy

author.organization: The Commission for Lesbian, Gay Bisexual and Transgender People at the University of Tennessee, Knoxville

document.abstract: Resolution recommending that the University of Tennessee include sexual orientation and gender identity in its hiring and personnel policies and that sexual orientation and gender identity be recognized and treated in the same manner as other categories in the universityâ€™s hiring and personnel policies.
document.publication-title: Commission for LGBT - Reports, Minutes, Events and Other Documents
